title: Bering Land Bridge National Preserve: Environmental Factors
body: Environmental Factors        The northern lights can be sighted over Bering Land Bridge NPS Photo - Andrea Willingham   Â    The arctic is home to some of the most beautiful phenomena on earth, such as the Northern Lights, and at the same time is one of the most fragile ecosystems, vulnerable to the effects of climate change. Explore these pages to learn about the science and local perspectives on environmental factors in Bering Land Bridge National Preserve.
